CustomField.formula: CASE(CRM_Type__c, 'STB', 'Skriv til bruker - ', 'STO', 'Skriv til oss - ', 'CHAT', 'Chat - ', 'Tr√•d' ) + DIA_Timeline_Category__c + IF(CRM_Number_of_unread_Messages__c != 0, ' (' + TEXT(CRM_Number_of_unread_Messages__c) + IF(CRM_Number_of_unread_Messages__c > 1, ' uleste meldinger)', ' ulest melding)' ), '' )
CustomField.label: Timeline Name
